verses.name: Isaiah 1:1
verses.text: The vision of Isaiah the son of Amoz, which he saw concerning Judah and Jerusalem in the days of Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah, kings of Judah.

verses.name: Isaiah 1:2
verses.text: Hear, O heavens, and give ear, O earth: for the Lord hath spoken, I have nourished and brought up children, and they have rebelled against me.

verses.name: Isaiah 1:3
verses.text: The ox knoweth his owner, and the ass his master’s crib: but Israel doth not know, my people doth not consider.
